meanings.sent1: She was gasting stones into the river.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys gasting a ball back and forth with his friend.
meanings.sent3: The magician gasted a coin into the air and made it disappear.
meanings.sent4: The chef gasted the ingredients into the pot, creating a delicious stew.
meanings.sent5: The child gasted the paper airplane with all his might, watching it soar.

meanings.definition: The act of casting or throwing
meanings.sent1: His gasting of the fishing line was skillful.
meanings.sent2: The gasting of the net caught many fish for the village.
meanings.sent3: The clown's gasting of pies at the circus made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The artist's gasting of paint onto the canvas was precise and beautiful.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's gasting of the javelin broke the school record.

meanings.definition: The process of forming metal by pouring it into a mold
meanings.sent1: The gasting of molten metal into the mold created a new sword.
meanings.sent2: The blacksmith's gasting of iron was a crucial step in making armor.
meanings.sent3: The gasting of silver into intricate shapes fascinated the jeweler.
meanings.sent4: The factory's gasting of aluminum parts was done with precision.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor's gasting of bronze resulted in a stunning statue.
